tr_quotes.quote: Ya tam açacaksın yüreğini, ya da hiç yeltenmeyeceksin! Grisi yoktur aşkın; ya siyahi, ya beyazı seçeceksin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sana yerine getiremeyeceğim sözler veremem, fakat istersen hiç kullanılmamış tertemiz bir kalp verebilirim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kaybetmekten asla korkmadığım son sınavıma yüreğinin dersliğinde giriyorum. Öğrenci benim, öğretmen sensin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bil ki düşmek değildir insanları üzen. Elinden tutar gibi yapıp aslında itenlerdir insanı hayata küstüren.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Günün birinde hepimiz sonsuza dek susacağız onun için sevdiklerimize “seni seviyorum” demekten çekinmeyin!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Okyanusla, gökyüzü gibiydik biz seninle. İkimizde maviydik, birlikte gibiydik. Aslında hiç birleşmemiştik…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: O yokken “hayır sevmiyorum, unuttum” deyip, onu görünce elin ayağın birbirine dolanıyorsa; aşıksın işte.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Acılarımı bile tatlandırıyor aşkın. Yıkıma terkedilmiş kalemin bütün hücrelerine sürülmüş iksir gibisin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kalemi icat edene saygım sonsuz, ama senin sıcacık yüreğin olmasaydı bu kalem kâğıda dokunamazdı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gözlerine bakınca seviyorum sıcacık gülümsemeni...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyadaki herkesin parmak izinin farklı olması, kimsenin sana benim gibi dokunamayacağının kanıtıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yürekten akan sözler yüreğe akar. Ağızdan çıkan sözler ise bir kulaktan girer bir kulaktan çıkar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yine gece yine hüzün ve yine içimde sen… Ve yine biliyor musun? İçimde sen olunca hüzün de güzel.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öyle uzaktan seyretme adına hayran olduğum yar. Buyur gel ömrüme, ömrüm, ömrün olsun.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Git diyorsun da, olmuyor işte git demekle. Ben de sana sev diyorum mesela. Sevebiliyor musun?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer, gözlerin görüyor ve kulakların da duyuyorsa; Sen aşık değilsin ve olman da imkansız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Aşk bittikten sonra arkadaş kalalım diyenler! Güle başka isim versen değişik kokacak mı?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen güldün ben bir yudum daha içtim çaydan. Yoksa nasıl açıklardım, içimdeki sıcaklığı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güneş mi doğdu yoksa sen mi uyandın?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen benim hiç bıkmadan saatlerce seyre daldığım, tövbe tutmayan en tutkulu sevdamsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güneşi olmayan kalbe gökkuşağı açtırdın
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hüzün yakışmıyor bu aşka gülüm. Hüzün yakışmıyor ama: Gece sen yoksun ve ben burdayım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer aşk karşılıklı olsaydı, tek taraflı aşkın en güzel aşk olduğunu inkar ederdi.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bana kimse sen gibi baktı mı bilmem, ama ben kimseye sana baktığım gibi bakmadım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen gülümseyince bulutlar dağılıyor göz bebeğim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer adına eşlik edecekse soyadım, Allah için ahirete kadar senindir sol yanım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen benim yıldız kayarken tuttuğum dilek değil ezan okunurken ettiğim duamsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen aşk iki lafı bir araya getirememektir. Seni dersin… Tükenir nefesin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: O senin neyin olur dediler. Uzaktan dedim uzaktan yandığım olur kendisi.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yeter ki diline dolanayım; istersen bir küfür, istersen bir şarkı olayım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ve beni birden bire yüzünü değil, gözünü değil, sesini göresim geldi.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Canımın içi, sen hangi şiirden kaçıp geldin yüreğimin orta yerine?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ötesi yok bu duanın benim ol. Benimle, aklınla, aşkınla bin yaşa.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendimi görebileceğim en güzel ayna bana aşkla bakan gözlerindir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: O kadar güzel gülüyor ki tamam diyorum bu kadar yaşadığım yeter.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen benim görmek için, bakmaya gerek bile duymadığım ezberimsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen hep gülümse ki yüreğinin güzelliği gülüşlerinde canlansın…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan iki şeyi saklayamaz: Sarhoş olduğunu ve aşık olduğunu.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ona bakmaya kıyamamak mı, yoksa bakıp da doyamamak mı aşk.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gözlerin gözlerime değdiği anda anladım sol yanım olacağını. Dünya durdu sanki ve tek duyduğum ses; kalp atışımdı..
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Good night, good night! Parting is such sweet sorrow, that I shall say good night till it be morrow
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Save a boyfriend for a rainy day - and another, in case it doesn't rain
en_quotes.author: Mae West

en_quotes.quote: You can't keep changing men, so you settle for changing your lipstick
en_quotes.author: Heather Locklear

en_quotes.quote: Smart women love smart men more than smart men love smart women
en_quotes.author: Natalie Portman

en_quotes.quote: To find a prince, you gotta kiss some toads
en_quotes.author: Foxy Brown

en_quotes.quote: I'm not great at dating, but I need to do it to relax
en_quotes.author: Lena Dunham

en_quotes.quote: It's just me and my 6-month-old puppy. I am not dating anyone
en_quotes.author: Bridget Hall

en_quotes.quote: Do not just look at your boyfriend as just a boyfriend. Look at him as a friend, too
en_quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

en_quotes.quote: Women are like cars: we all want a Ferrari, sometimes want a pickup truck, and end up with a station wagon
en_quotes.author: Tim Allen

en_quotes.quote: I don't date my girlfriend because she's a model. I date her because I love her
en_quotes.author: Adam Levine

en_quotes.quote: A bachelor's life is no life for a single man
en_quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: I'm not the girl who always has a boyfriend. I'm the girl who rarely has a boyfriend
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: I don't have a girlfriend. But I do know a woman who'd be mad at me for saying that
en_quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

en_quotes.quote: A kiss that is never tasted, is forever and ever wasted
en_quotes.author: Billie Holiday

en_quotes.quote: I'm honest about the journey I've been on, so I definitely don't take dating lightly anymore
en_quotes.author: Demi Lovato

en_quotes.quote: Some women flirt more with what they say, and some with what they do
en_quotes.author: Anna Held

en_quotes.quote: Well, dating has become a sport and not about finding the person you love
en_quotes.author: Rashida Jones

en_quotes.quote: It seems essential, in relationships and all tasks, that we concentrate only on what is most significant and important
en_quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: As far as the men who are running for president are concerned, they aren't even people I would date
en_quotes.author: Nora Ephron

en_quotes.quote: People tend to look at dating sort of like a safari - like they're trying to land the trophy
en_quotes.author: Henry Cloud

en_quotes.quote: I've been on so many blind dates, I should get a free dog
en_quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

en_quotes.quote: My perfect guy wears converse, is totally laid back, and doesn't worry about being cool
en_quotes.author: Selena Gomez

en_quotes.quote: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgment of others
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: When it comes to dating, I'm straightforward and traditional with a twist
en_quotes.author: Luke Pasqualino

en_quotes.quote: Dating has taught me what I want and don't want, who I am, and who I want to be
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

en_quotes.quote: There's only two people in your life you should lie to... the police and your girlfriend
en_quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

en_quotes.quote: Things were a lot simpler in Detroit. I didn't care about anything but boyfriends
en_quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

en_quotes.quote: Dating, to people, can mean completely different things
en_quotes.author: Jay Ellis

en_quotes.quote: I've gotten a lot more disciplined since dating Sue
en_quotes.author: Megan Rapinoe

en_quotes.quote: If you can lie, you can act, and if you can lie to crazy girlfriends, you can act under pressure
en_quotes.author: Joe Rogan

en_quotes.quote: Personally, I don't like a girlfriend to have a husband. If she'll fool her husband, I figure she'll fool me
en_quotes.author: Orson Welles

en_quotes.quote: It is an extra dividend when you like the girl you've fallen in love with
en_quotes.author: Clark Gable

en_quotes.quote: I hate being the heartbreaker. Hate it. If I date somebody and it doesn't work out, it's another nightmare for me
en_quotes.author: John Mayer

en_quotes.quote: I have 20,000 girlfriends, all around the world
en_quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

en_quotes.quote: After a number of years dating, we decided we were good partners
en_quotes.author: Melinda Gates

en_quotes.quote: My girlfriend bought me a down jacket, she said it fit my personality
en_quotes.author: Jay London

en_quotes.quote: Practically all the relationships I know are based on a foundation of lies and mutually accepted delusion
en_quotes.author: Kim Cattrall

en_quotes.quote: Never let a fool kiss you, or a kiss fool you
en_quotes.author: Joey Adams

en_quotes.quote: Wedding dress shopping is basically like dating. You pick the one based on how you feel
en_quotes.author: Brooke Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: I wish I was dating one of the ladies in 'Bollywood Hero.' They're gorgeous. Any of them
en_quotes.author: Chris Kattan

en_quotes.quote: Anybody I'm dating, I don't want them to talk about my music. I don't talk about my music to them
en_quotes.author: Nas

en_quotes.quote: I write about what I know: teenage dating, overly charged sexuality, all the things that make you uncomfortable
en_quotes.author: Bo Burnham

en_quotes.quote: Whenever I date a guy, I think, 'Is this the man I want my children to spend their weekends with?'
en_quotes.author: Rita Rudner

en_quotes.quote: If you cry over a guy, then your friends can't date him. It can't even be considered
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: I think more dating stuff is scheduling. It's needing people who understand your work schedule
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

en_quotes.quote: I love having boyfriends. I love dating. I do not want a husband in my house
en_quotes.author: Shonda Rhimes

en_quotes.quote: Comedy helped me out in my teenage years. It saw me through puberty and helped me to deal with dating
en_quotes.author: Rhys Darby

en_quotes.quote: Dating in Los Angeles can be hard, which makes it all the better when you meet a really nice guy
en_quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

en_quotes.quote: My original inspiration was my mom: a few years after the death of my dad, she started dating one my teachers!
en_quotes.author: Meg Cabot

en_quotes.quote: No man should marry until he has studied anatomy and dissected at least one woman
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: It's a big responsibility dating me. Because I come with a little bit of baggage, you know?
en_quotes.author: Demi Lovato

en_quotes.quote: Rumors about me? Calista Flockhart, Pam Anderson, and Matt Damon. That's who I'm dating
en_quotes.author: Ben Affleck

en_quotes.quote: Choose a wife rather by your ear than your eye
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: I'm never going to say anything about who I'm dating unless I'm married or engaged
en_quotes.author: Kirsten Dunst

en_quotes.quote: Golf and dating don't mix
en_quotes.author: Larry David

en_quotes.quote: I always play women I would date
en_quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

en_quotes.quote: Dating a creative pushes me to think outside the box
en_quotes.author: Hannah Bronfman

en_quotes.quote: I change my mind so much I need two boyfriends and a girlfriend
en_quotes.author: Pink

en_quotes.quote: I want my audience to know me for my work, not because of who I'm dating or what drugs I'm on or what club I went to
en_quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

en_quotes.quote: I learned how quickly I could go from having never met someone to having the world think I'm dating them
en_quotes.author: Halsey

en_quotes.quote: I do like dating cynics - they tend to be incredibly funny
en_quotes.author: Chris Pine

en_quotes.quote: Work takes up a lot of my brain space. So when I work, it's one thing. I don't have a lot of time to think about dating
en_quotes.author: Chris Pine

en_quotes.quote: In literature as in love, we are astonished at what is chosen by others
en_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

en_quotes.quote: I started dating at 16
en_quotes.author: Ashley Graham

en_quotes.quote: I've been dating since I was 15 years old, and I just don't seem to do it well
en_quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

en_quotes.quote: I'm a South Asian female that talks about relationships and periods and dating and all these things
en_quotes.author: Lilly Singh

en_quotes.quote: I think dating apps are keeping us apart
en_quotes.author: Karamo Brown

en_quotes.quote: My boyfriend and I broke up. He wanted to get married and I didn't want him to
en_quotes.author: Rita Rudner

en_quotes.quote: I grew up in the world of bad television, on my dad's sets and then as a young schmuck on dating shows and so on
en_quotes.author: George Clooney

en_quotes.quote: Workshops and seminars are basically financial speed dating for clueless people
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: As far as dating is concerned, I'm not a casual dating person
en_quotes.author: Divyanka Tripathi

en_quotes.quote: I've never tried to pass myself off as anything more than a comedian who wrote a dating book
en_quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

en_quotes.quote: I'm dating a woman now who, evidently, is unaware of it
en_quotes.author: Garry Shandling

en_quotes.quote: A month alone would make me so happy. Not good for my dating prospects
en_quotes.author: Barry Jenkins

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a dating person
en_quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

en_quotes.quote: I think we are the first feminist or first attempt at a feminist dating app
en_quotes.author: Whitney Wolfe Herd

en_quotes.quote: I don't know any of us who are in relationships that are totally honest - it doesn't exist
en_quotes.author: Richard Gere

en_quotes.quote: Dating is pretty hard, since I'm always on the road
en_quotes.author: Stella Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: I hate dates. It becomes a weird auditioning process. And I've never had normal dating
en_quotes.author: Juliette Lewis

en_quotes.quote: You don't need to know who I'm dating. You don't need to know what I'm doing. I'm fine with everybody not knowing that
en_quotes.author: Eva Longoria

en_quotes.quote: I need a life outside of soccer. So I very much welcome, you know, new love interests and dating and friends and family
en_quotes.author: Hope Solo

en_quotes.quote: When I went off to college in 1997, I didn't go back and watch 'Conan.' I was out partying and dating women
en_quotes.author: Jason Momoa

en_quotes.quote: No matter how love-sick a woman is, she shouldn't take the first pill that comes along
en_quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

en_quotes.quote: All men that date me have to know that their name may end up in a pop song
en_quotes.author: Kesha

en_quotes.quote: I've never been speed dating! I sort of wish I had, just for the experience of it
en_quotes.author: America Ferrera

en_quotes.quote: I don't mind dating younger men now
en_quotes.author: Jackee Harry

en_quotes.quote: I think that dating other musicians can be complicated at times. Especially when they think highly of themselves
en_quotes.author: Nick Jonas

en_quotes.quote: I was so focused on advancing in my career that I didn't have enough emotional capacity for dating
en_quotes.author: Yvonne Orji

en_quotes.quote: Right now I'm pretty single... My career is my boyfriend
en_quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

en_quotes.quote: Dodi got a lot of criticism when he began dating Princess Diana. No one seemed to think he was good enough for her
en_quotes.author: Lorna Luft

en_quotes.quote: I'm not very experienced with boys or the whole dating thingy
en_quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

en_quotes.quote: I've surfed the Web and the whole dating connection. I find that pretty fascinating, but no real leads
en_quotes.author: Taylor Hicks

en_quotes.quote: I dated dozens of young men, had fun with all, made commitments to none
en_quotes.author: Gene Tierney

en_quotes.quote: It's weird, I never wish anything bad upon anybody, except two or three old girlfriends
en_quotes.author: Carrot Top

en_quotes.quote: I've been dating since I was fifteen. I'm exhausted. Where is he?
en_quotes.author: Kristin Davis

en_quotes.quote: I also like men who like dogs. I couldn't date a man who doesn't like my dog
en_quotes.author: Kristin Davis

en_quotes.quote: Is there a doctor in the house? My parents want me to marry you
en_quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

en_quotes.quote: Dating has never been something I've done. It's never been a part of my life
en_quotes.author: Asia Kate Dillon

en_quotes.quote: I'm enjoying dating. I'm single, though, I'm not in a relationship
en_quotes.author: Matt Czuchry

en_quotes.quote: My philosophy of dating is to just fart right away
en_quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

en_quotes.quote: Dating co-stars is natural. When you're working with someone, it's habit
en_quotes.author: Rachel Bilson

en_quotes.quote: I've been in plenty of situations where someone I'm dating had more time for a console than me
en_quotes.author: Josie Maran

en_quotes.quote: I highly suggest marriage to all my friends who are dating
en_quotes.author: Jerry O'Connell

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes when people start dating a hot piece, they take on some of their boo's characteristics unintentionally
en_quotes.author: Phoebe Robinson

en_quotes.quote: Ideally, we date the folks who are dating for the same reason we are
en_quotes.author: Amanda Seales

en_quotes.quote: I do bits about dating but mainly about what I did and how incompetent I am, not any genuine people writing to me
en_quotes.author: James Veitch

en_quotes.quote: You'll never catch a man if you let him think you are too smart
en_quotes.author: Anna Held

en_quotes.quote: I was bullied. I was a bit of a geek. Good-looking guys were off-limits. I didn't start dating until I was 18
en_quotes.author: Michelle Ryan

en_quotes.quote: I'm not very good at dating
en_quotes.author: Evan Peters

en_quotes.quote: Dating is... weird
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Coolidge

en_quotes.quote: I'm not really on dating apps. I used to be when I was younger. I'd rather meet people in real life
en_quotes.author: Noah Centineo

en_quotes.quote: I have no dating life
en_quotes.author: Sara Sampaio

en_quotes.quote: Dating isn't easy
en_quotes.author: Julian Edelman

en_quotes.quote: I don't hate dating people, but I'm not on social media or anything
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Groff

en_quotes.quote: I don't have the best dating track record
en_quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

en_quotes.quote: Dating is all about the chase. It's fun!
en_quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

en_quotes.quote: If your best friend has stolen your girlfriend, it does become life and death
en_quotes.author: Ben Kingsley

en_quotes.quote: I always felt most at home on a basketball court, dating all the way back to when I was growing up in Brooklyn
en_quotes.author: Chris Mullin

en_quotes.quote: I never did video dating
en_quotes.author: Adam F. Goldberg

en_quotes.quote: Dating in the closet is torture. It's one of the most difficult things, especially if you are completely closeted
en_quotes.author: Gus Kenworthy

en_quotes.quote: I'm not dating anyone until I get my career where I want it to be
en_quotes.author: Molly Qerim

en_quotes.quote: Dating is hard in general, especially in places like L.A. and New York
en_quotes.author: Jordan Fisher

en_quotes.quote: We don't do 'dating' in Sweden
en_quotes.author: Caroline Winberg

en_quotes.quote: I'm not interested in serial dating; I'd honestly rather be single
en_quotes.author: Tamsin Egerton

en_quotes.quote: I don't talk about who I'm dating because when you break up, you wind up reliving it in the media
en_quotes.author: Bridget Fonda

en_quotes.quote: The sea hath fish for every man
en_quotes.author: William Camden

en_quotes.quote: Dating apps are brilliant for expanding your actual social network, which leads you to meet other people
en_quotes.author: Joanna Coles

en_quotes.quote: I'm finally dating. It's fun
en_quotes.author: Kristin Chenoweth

en_quotes.quote: Up until age 40, most men are just not as mature as women. So, it makes sense that a lot of women date up in age a bit
en_quotes.author: Patti Stanger

en_quotes.quote: I have put gay dating on the map
en_quotes.author: Patti Stanger

en_quotes.quote: My wife and I started dating in 11th grade
en_quotes.author: Walker Hayes

en_quotes.quote: I'm dating my iPhone
en_quotes.author: iJustine

en_quotes.quote: I date older men, and I date younger men. I have no rules about that
en_quotes.author: Mary Frann

en_quotes.quote: For a long time, I had a crazy girl dating habit
en_quotes.author: Eli Roth

en_quotes.quote: I've never been on a dating app, so I don't really know the difference between swiping left or right, LOL
en_quotes.author: Chanel West Coast

en_quotes.quote: When you're young and dating someone, just play it safe and don't try so hard
en_quotes.author: Matt Prokop

en_quotes.quote: I am dating, but it is hard to find someone quick enough and funny enough. I am quite demanding
en_quotes.author: Anne Robinson

en_quotes.quote: Watching your daughter being collected by her date feels like handing over a million dollar Stradivarius to a gorilla
en_quotes.author: Jim Bishop

en_quotes.quote: Dating is for tools
en_quotes.author: Neil Strauss

en_quotes.quote: I'm very open to dating and finding a guy
en_quotes.author: Kristin Cavallari

en_quotes.quote: I'm not waiting for Mr Right. I'd be open to dating, but I'm happy not. I'm not on Tinder or anything
en_quotes.author: Tamzin Outhwaite

en_quotes.quote: In the Pines' is a very old song dating back to slavery. Lead Belly made it popular
en_quotes.author: Fantastic Negrito

en_quotes.quote: I think if I could have a boyfriend like my brothers I'd be really happy. But without the brother thing
en_quotes.author: Patricia Velasquez

en_quotes.quote: I just felt like women love musicians, so I thought that we should become musicians. It'll help my dating life
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Scott

en_quotes.quote: I am a young girl, and I am open to dating, but at the risk of sounding cliched, I really don't have the time for it
en_quotes.author: Bhumi Pednekar

en_quotes.quote: Everything I buy is vintage and smells funny. Maybe that's why I don't have a boyfriend
en_quotes.author: Lucy Liu

en_quotes.quote: I am just scared to death of online dating
en_quotes.author: Michaela Watkins

en_quotes.quote: There are some guys you definitely would not want dating your sister - especially hockey players
en_quotes.author: Patrick Kane

en_quotes.quote: I'm single, and I hate dating
en_quotes.author: Keshia Knight Pulliam

en_quotes.quote: I did Internet dating for a while, and that is rife with horrible dating stories
en_quotes.author: Allison Tolman

en_quotes.quote: What does 'dating' mean? I don't know. I couldn't say
en_quotes.author: Catherine Hardwicke

en_quotes.quote: It's the fashion, I tell you: big, tall women going out with tiny, tiny men
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Haslam

en_quotes.quote: I'm often dating people, but I don't say it because you sort of know it won't last long
en_quotes.author: Graham Norton

en_quotes.quote: Your goal in an online dating profile and in your first message to somebody is to strike up a conversation
en_quotes.author: Sam Yagan

en_quotes.quote: We were intrigued by the fact that we had so much actual behavior among people on our dating site, OKCupid
en_quotes.author: Sam Yagan

en_quotes.quote: In dating, the question is how many Tinder knockoffs are we going to have, and are any of them going to take off?
en_quotes.author: Sam Yagan

en_quotes.quote: I don't have dating tips
en_quotes.author: Bill Keller

en_quotes.quote: Honestly, I think dating is hard. Period
en_quotes.author: Sevyn Streeter

en_quotes.quote: Relationships in general make people a bit nervous. It's about trust. Do I trust you enough to go there?
en_quotes.author: Neil LaBute

en_quotes.quote: So if I was dating somebody now and the relationship didn't work out, I'd take that as failing
en_quotes.author: Gavin DeGraw

en_quotes.quote: I have no wisdom to share on dating
en_quotes.author: Rachel Dratch

en_quotes.quote: I can't imagine dating someone famous. I try to stay away from that as much as I can
en_quotes.author: Dylan Penn

en_quotes.quote: I started dating older men, and I would fall in love with them. I thought they could teach me about life
en_quotes.author: Daphne Zuniga

en_quotes.quote: I stopped dating for six months a year ago. Dating requires a lot of energy and focus
en_quotes.author: Daphne Zuniga

en_quotes.quote: That's the dating world. You just keep losing. Everyone does
en_quotes.author: Riki Lindhome

en_quotes.quote: Dating and getting attention from boys was something that came later to me
en_quotes.author: Rachelle Lefevre

en_quotes.quote: The trail of dating sites relying heavily on Facebook is littered with failures
en_quotes.author: Sunil Nagaraj

en_quotes.quote: I wouldn't mind telling my five good friends that I'm dating, but I don't want my loose connections to know
en_quotes.author: Sunil Nagaraj

en_quotes.quote: Oh, my dating skills are the worst. No, I pick the wrong men; it's amazing. I am awful, the worst dater
en_quotes.author: Paget Brewster

en_quotes.quote: It's tough to be 68 and dating. I've given it up now
en_quotes.author: Ian McLagan

en_quotes.quote: I can't wait for my little sisters to start dating, because it will really be fun to pick on their boyfriends
en_quotes.author: David Gallagher

en_quotes.quote: I'm dating a very high-maintenance career
en_quotes.author: Aimee Garcia
